title: Bloomberg's Torres on Brutal Journey Back to Work (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Torres on Brutal Journey Back to Work (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Craig Torres, Fed reporter for Bloomberg News, on the brutal journey back to work for millions of Americans. Broadcasting LIVE at Pershing's INSITE 2016 conference in Orlando.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
